com.io7m.r2.meshes

Class R2MeshTangentsAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.r2.meshes.R2MeshTangentsAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    R2ErrorConsumerType, R2MeshParserInterleavedListenerType, R2MeshTangentsAdapterType

    public final class R2MeshTangentsAdapter
extends Object
implements R2MeshTangentsAdapterType
    An implementation of the R2MeshParserInterleavedListenerType interface that produces a value of type R2MeshTangentsType after parsing has completed.
